item.title: 6u4rd
item.description: README.md ðŸ‘‹ 6u4rd Your backdoor for your device. It is a simple utility when it is up and running; you get an email every hour with a unique link. You are presented with a hideous dashboard; you can control your device using this dashboard. Don’t ask me why i did it (._.). Installation & Usage: Follow these steps: 1st: git clone https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/6u4rd.git 2nd: cd 6u4rd 3rd: pip install -r requirements.txt 4th: Setup Dummy Account (Gmail) 5th: Get ngrok token 5th python3 6u4rd.
